item.title: 英国能源价格将比此前预测进一步下降
item.description: 英国电价将比预期进一步下降，从而缓解家庭能源账单，但仍远高于危机前水平。【原文：UK electricity prices are set to fall further than expected, easing household energy bills but remaining well above pre-crisis levels.】

item.title: 巴西回击美国放弃对乙醇进口征收关税的压力
item.description: 巴西农业部长卡洛斯-法瓦罗（Carlos Fávaro）表示，尽管拜登政府提出了 "强硬 "的抱怨，但巴西将继续对美国进口乙醇征收关税。【原文：Brazil will maintain tariffs on US ethanol imports despite “tough” complaints from the Biden administration, said Agriculture Minister Carlos Fávaro.】

item.title: 通胀进展停滞不前，美联储面临降息 "软期限
item.description: 美联储通往降低通胀之路的坎坷看起来更像是一个路障，使其今年的降息计划备受质疑。【原文：The bump in the Federal Reserve’s path to lower inflation is looking more like a roadblock, throwing into doubt its plans for interest-rate cuts this year.】

item.title: 瑞银集团总裁的 1600 万美元薪酬引起了财政部长的关注
item.description: 瑞士财政部长卡琳-凯勒-萨特（Karin Keller-Sutter）表示，她对支付给塞尔吉奥-埃尔莫蒂（Sergio Ermotti）等高管的薪酬水平感到担忧。【原文：Swiss Finance Minister Karin Keller-Sutter said she was concerned about the level of compensation paid out to executives such as Sergio Ermotti, who was brought back to run UBS Group AG a year ago and oversee the rescue of Credit Suisse.】

item.title: 佛蒙特进步学院面临破产后将关闭
item.description: 佛蒙特州的戈达德学院（Goddard College）成为最新一所关闭的小型文理学院，加入了近几个月来宣布关闭学院的浪潮。【原文：Goddard College in Vermont became the latest small liberal arts school to close, joining a wave of institutions that have made such announcements in recent months.】

item.title: 捷克人呼吁古普塔向当地自由钢铁公司返还现金
item.description: 捷克政府敦促自由钢铁公司归还拖欠其国内部门的款项，以此恢复这家陷入困境的钢厂的生产，并满足当地员工和债权人的要求。【原文：The Czech government urged Liberty Steel to return money owed to its unit in the country as a way to resume production at the troubled steel mill and satisfy local employees and creditors.】

item.title: Cantor Fitzgerald 的 Howard Lutnick 称稳定币有助于支持美元
item.description: Cantor Fitzgerald LP 首席执行官霍华德-卢特尼克（Howard Lutnick）表示，加密稳定币有利于美国经济，并指出金融资产的代币化可能会增加。【原文：Cantor Fitzgerald LP Chief Executive Officer Howard Lutnick said that crypto stablecoins are beneficial for the US economy and noted that the tokenization of financial assets will likely increase.】

item.title: 桑坦德银行从 Perella、William Blair 和 Moelis 聘请交易员
item.description: 桑坦德银行（Banco Santander SA）从华尔街竞争对手那里聘请了三位交易员，以继续建设其美国投资银行。【原文：Banco Santander SA hired a trio of dealmakers from Wall Street rivals as it continues to build out its US investment bank.】

item.title: 对冲基金经理拉里-罗宾斯加入财富移民行列，担心纽约市受到冲击
item.description: 拉里-罗宾斯开玩笑说，他是最后一个搬到佛罗里达的对冲基金经理。【原文：Larry Robbins jokes he’s the last hedge fund manager to move to Florida.】

item.title: 摩根大通的凯利听到了 "六月降息的关门声
item.description:
他说，CPI 印刷品给美联储带来的结果与其指导不符

。【原文：

CPI print delivers Fed an outcome that doesn’t fit with its guidance, he says

】

item.title: 交易员在美国消费者物价指数公布后减少欧洲央行降准押注，将目光投向拉加德
item.description: 在美国通胀率超过预期后，交易员们减少了对欧洲央行降息的押注，市场现在将注意力转向了欧洲央行行长克里斯蒂娜-拉加德（Christine Lagarde）周四的讲话。【原文：Traders pared bets on European Central Bank interest-rate cuts after US inflation topped forecasts, with markets now turning their attention to President Christine Lagarde’s remarks on Thursday.】

item.title: 联邦存款保险公司（FDIC）总裁称美国已做好华尔街大型银行倒闭的准备
item.description: 美国联邦存款保险公司（Federal Deposit Insurance Corp.【原文：The head of the Federal Deposit Insurance Corp. says the US would be prepared to handle any collapse of a major Wall Street bank.】

item.title: 制造业强劲，高盛上调中国经济增长预期
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. raised its outlook for China’s economic growth this year as factory activity accelerates more than expected.】

item.title: 布雷万-霍华德（Brevan Howard）的加密货币基金上涨 35%，宏观交易下滑
item.description: 布雷万-霍华德资产管理公司（Brevan Howard Asset Management）的加密货币基金目前是这家对冲基金公司的一个亮点，该公司今年在宏观交易上出现了亏损。【原文：Brevan Howard Asset Management’s cryptocurrency fund is currently a bright spot for the hedge fund firm, which lost money on macro trades this year.】

item.title: 泰晤士河水务公司债券持有者警告减息有引发连锁反应的风险
item.description: 泰晤士河水务公司的一个主要债权人警告说，如果英国接管该公司并让债券持有人蒙受损失，就有可能阻止对其其他基础设施资产的投资。【原文：A key creditor to Thames Water has warned that the UK risks deterring investment from its other infrastructure assets if it takes over the firm and imposes losses on bondholders.】

item.title: 高盛称是时候将科技利润转投其他领域了
item.description: 高盛资产管理公司（Goldman Sachs Asset Management）正在从高涨的科技股中攫取部分利润，并将资金投入价格更低的公司。【原文：Goldman Sachs Asset Management is skimming off some of its profits from high-flying technology shares and putting the money into cheaper companies.】

item.title: 西方石油公司将在管道泄漏后重启墨西哥湾石油产出
item.description: 西方石油公司（Occidental Petroleum Corp. ）在去年因第三方输油管泄漏而被要求减少产量后，将重新启动墨西哥湾的部分石油生产。【原文：Occidental Petroleum Corp. will restart some Gulf of Mexico oil production after being asked to curtail output due to a third-party pipeline leak last year.】

item.title: 前特朗普首席财务官艾伦-韦塞尔伯格被判入狱五个月
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）房地产公司的长期首席财务官艾伦-韦塞尔伯格（Allen Weisselberg）因在纽约起诉前总统的民事欺诈案中宣誓说谎而被判入狱五个月，这是他第二次身陷囹圄。【原文：Allen Weisselberg, the longtime chief financial officer of Donald Trump’s real estate company, was sentenced to five months in jail for lying under oath during New York’s civil fraud case against the former president, setting up his second stint behind bars.】

item.title: 在 1 万亿美元的人工智能大潮之后，Meta 的交易价格低于华丽七号
item.description: Meta Platforms 公司在人工智能的推动下创下了历史新高，自 2022 年最黑暗的日子以来，其市值已增加了 1 万亿美元，但从某些角度来看，它的交易价格仍处于折价状态。【原文：Meta Platforms Inc.’s record-breaking, artificial intelligence-fueled rally has added $1 trillion in market value since its darkest days of 2022, and yet by some perspectives it’s still trading at a discount.】

item.title: 尽管科技股大涨，股票对冲基金仍未能跑赢基准基金
item.description: 得益于一些高歌猛进的科技公司，选股型对冲基金在第一季度的收益超过了其他任何主要策略。【原文：Stock-picking hedge funds gained more than any other major strategy in the first quarter thanks to some high-flying tech names — and it still wasn’t good enough to beat the markets.】

item.title: 梅西百货董事会新增两名 Arkhouse 提名人，交易谈判继续进行
item.description: 梅西百货公司任命了由激进投资者 Arkhouse Management Co. 公司提名的两名新董事，该公司同意在试图收购梅西百货公司的过程中终止寻求董事会多数席位的努力。【原文：Macy’s Inc. named two new directors nominated by activist investor Arkhouse Management Co., which agreed to end its effort to seek majority board representation as it attempts to acquire the department-store operator.】

item.title: 专注于西非的金矿公司阿桑特将竞购纽蒙特的阿基姆公司
item.description: 纽蒙特公司的阿基姆金矿是加纳生产商阿桑特黄金公司的目标，该公司计划在本月与潜在的中国买家竞购该资产。【原文：Newmont Corp.’s Akyem gold mine is a target for Ghana-focused producer Asante Gold Corp., which plans to bid for the asset against potential Chinese buyers this month.】

item.title: SVB 倒闭一年后，加州银行重回聚光灯下
item.description: 河城银行自诩为 "中型企业中的大型企业"。【原文：River City Bank likes to boast that it’s a midsized firm that thinks big.】

item.title: 法国赤字将进一步扩大，马克龙压力增大
item.description: 法国政府表示，由于埃马纽埃尔-马克龙（Emmanuel Macron）面临削减开支或寻找新的国家收入来源的压力，其赤字将比预期的更大。【原文：The French government said its deficit will be wider than anticipated as pressure mounts on Emmanuel Macron to cut expenses — or find new sources of state income.】

item.title: 尼日利亚召回南非制造的有毒 J&J 儿童止咳糖浆
item.description: 尼日利亚当局召回了强生儿童止咳糖浆，因为实验室结果显示该产品具有潜在的致命毒性。【原文：Nigerian authorities have recalled a Johnson & Johnson children’s cough syrup after laboratory findings showed potentially deadly levels of toxicity.】

item.title: 日元兑美元跌破 152，加剧干预风险
item.description: 日元走软，跌穿了人们密切关注的 1 美元兑 152 日元的水平，使人们更加猜测日本当局将入市支撑日元。【原文：The yen weakened through the closely watched level of 152 per dollar, increasing speculation that Japanese authorities will step into the market to support the currency.】

item.title: 收益率飙升，交易商预计美联储 2024 年仅会降息两次
item.description: 国债收益率飙升，创下今年迄今的新高，因为数据显示 3 月份消费者物价涨幅超过预期，促使投资者放弃对美联储今年两次以上降息的押注。【原文：Treasury yields soared, reaching new year-to-date highs, as data showing consumer prices rose more than estimated in March prompted investors to abandon wagers on more than two Federal Reserve interest-rate cuts this year.】

item.title: 瑞士暂不赋予监管机构罚款银行的权力
item.description: 尽管包括财政部长在内的各界人士普遍支持这项措施，但瑞士政府仍未授予该国银行业监管机构对贷款机构进行罚款的权力。【原文：The Swiss government stopped short of offering the country’s banking watchdog the power to fine lenders, despite widespread support for the measure — including from the finance minister.】

item.title: 根据瑞士建议，瑞银将面临大幅提高的资本规定
item.description: 瑞士信贷集团（Credit Suisse）倒闭后，瑞士政府主张进行改革，根据改革要求，瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）的监管资本将面临 "大幅 "增加。【原文：UBS Group AG faces a “substantial” increase in regulatory capital requirements under reforms that the Swiss government is advocating for in the wake of the collapse of Credit Suisse.】

item.title: 德国 SEFE 考虑恢复在乌克兰的天然气储存
item.description: 德国国有天然气贸易商 SEFE 正在考虑再次在乌克兰储存天然气，因为这家俄罗斯天然气工业股份公司（Gazprom PJSC）的前身正在寻求加强欧洲的能源安全。【原文：German state-owned natural gas trader SEFE is considering storing gas in Ukraine again as the former unit of Russia’s Gazprom PJSC seeks to bolster Europe’s energy security.】
